name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As an IT Operations Engineer with a robust foundation in Windows Server Administration, Active Directory, and Microsoft 365, I leverage my comprehensive skills in Endpoint Management and Microsoft Autopilot to enhance operational efficiency. Proficient in PowerShell and Bash scripting, I ensure effective automation and management of IT processes. My experience with RMM Systems and a solid understanding of Network Administration enables me to monitor systems proactively and handle incidents effectively. Additionally, my analytical thinking and process-oriented approach, combined with strong collaboration skills, empower me to contribute effectively to team goals. With 8+ years of experience in software engineering, my background includes building high-performance applications using **Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy)**, frontend technologies such as **Angular, Vue, React, and Next.js**, and cloud services like **AWS and Azure**. My expertise in database optimization with **PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB** further enhances my ability to deliver reliable solutions.
